column1: Art Institute of Chicago////We had about 4 hours to kill so decided to stop by the Art Institute because it was near our hotel. Once there
column2: we discovered it housed many famous and impressive works
column3: most notably American Gothic. As a whole the museum is extremely well curated
column5: organized. Although we were speeding through
column6: we were about to pause at stuff we were interested without feeling like we were missing out on anything. It would be more educational to scrutinize every piece but really
column7: art is about what grabs you and makes an impression. The most surprising interesting galleries? The miniature rooms and the cultural art of the Americas.
